hero.title: Smart Heat Pump
hero.description: The revolutionary dashboard that transforms how installers monitor and control heat pumps remotely. Make commissioning, servicing, and customer support faster and simpler than ever before.

about.title: About Go be Smart
about.description: We're a startup revolutionizing the heat pump industry with cutting-edge technology that connects installers with their installations like never before.
about.missionText: To empower heat pump installers with intelligent remote monitoring and control capabilities, reducing service calls, improving customer satisfaction, and accelerating the transition to sustainable heating solutions.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: A comprehensive dashboard that puts the power of remote heat pump management at your fingertips

smartCommissioning.title: Smart Commissioning
smartCommissioning.description: Streamline the installation process with automated setup procedures, guided workflows, and real-time system validation.

remoteMonitoring.title: Remote Monitoring
remoteMonitoring.description: Monitor heat pump performance, energy efficiency, and system health in real-time from anywhere, anytime.

rapidSupport.title: Rapid Support
rapidSupport.description: Diagnose issues remotely, provide instant customer support, and resolve problems before they become costly service calls.

benefits.title: Why Choose Go be Smart?
benefits.description: Transform your heat pump installation business with measurable benefits

stats.commissioningDesc: Reduce installation time with automated processes

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
cta.description: Join the revolution in heat pump management. Get early access to our platform and be among the first to experience the future of remote monitoring.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Ready to learn more? We'd love to hear from you.

footer.description: Revolutionizing heat pump management with smart technology and remote monitoring solutions.
